name: DirectDefense
tagline: Be Informed. Be Strategic. Be Secure.
description:
Since 2011, DirectDefense has been offering comprehensive computer security testing services with specialization in application security, vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and compliance assurance testing.Â 
Boasting a group of well-rounded and diverse consultants, DirectDefense has worked with a majority of the Fortune 100 companies, including power and utility, gaming, retail, financial, media, travel, aerospace, healthcare, and software development organizations.
